name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Cavity modes
2. Spherical-mirror resonators
3. Nonlinear optics
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Cavity modes (3 weeks)
Spherical-mirror resonators (4 weeks)
Midterm exam (26-Apr)
Nonlinear optics (7 weeks)
Final exam (21-Jun)
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
remarks: 因應疫情遠距教學規劃：●上課方式：遠距上課連結 https://meet.google.com/xus-hxgd-qha●評量方式：期中與期末評量方式待定
